children.name: Armenian Church Music
children.description: One of the oldest branches of Christian culture, this is the predominantly vocal music of the Armenian Apostolic Church.

children.name: Armenian Folk Music
children.description: Traditional Folk Music of the Armenians, which is attested in historic Armenia since antiquity, with unique regional dialects unified by general melodic structure.

children.name: Rabiz
children.description: Elements of Armenian folk in its instrumentation, oftentimes incorporating influences from Arabic and other West Asian forms on a background of synthesizer arrangements.
